mn104:2.4: Vadhoyeva kho → vadhoyeveko (si, sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed, mr)
mn104:2.5: nibbinnarūpā → nibbiṇṇarūpā (cck); nibbindarūpā (sya1ed, sya2ed, km, pts-vp-pli1ed, mr)
mn104:3.1: vassaṃvuṭṭho → vassaṃ vuttho (bj, sya-all, km); vassavuttho (pts-vp-pli1ed)
mn104:5.6: ca kho → santi ca kho (sya-all, km); santi ca (mr)
mn104:7-11.4: micchādiṭṭhi → micchādiṭṭhī (bj, sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed, mr)
mn104:16.6: Tassa kho → tassa kho evaṃ (si, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed)
mn104:17.13: Tassa kho → tassa kho evaṃ (sya-all, km, mr)
mn104:18.3: vuḍḍhataraṃ bhikkhuṃ → buḍḍhataro bhikkhu (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed); vuḍḍhataro bhikkhu (sya-all, km)
